title: How it shall be henceforth written
content:
It is obvious that we have blogs about everything. As I drove into work this morning I decided that I'd indulge my love of lists. The idea being that I will give readers other links that I think need to be viewed, read, heard, purchased, licensed, quoted or otherwise.

Read: [Change or Die](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822221522/http:/www.fastcompany.com/magazine/94/open_change-or-die.html), Fast Company  
Purchase: [Acoustic 4](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822221522/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/redirect?link_code=ur2&camp=1789&tag=typophile-20&creative=9325&path=ASIN/B0002SVLRQ/qid=1115742128/sr=2-1/ref=pd_bbs_b_2_1) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822221522im_/http:/www.assoc-amazon.com/e/ir?t=typophile-20&l=ur2&o=1), Various Artists  
License: [FF Absara](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822221522/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.11455.0.0), FontShop  
Quote: _Never let a fool kiss you or a kiss fool you_--Emily Bronte
author: Miss Tiffany
